import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Cart({ cartItems, setCartItems }) { console.log("cartItems", cartItems); const addQty = () => { if (singleProduct.stock == qty) { return; } setQty((state) => state + 1); }; const decreaseCart = () => { if (qty > 1) { setQty((state) => state - 1); } }; return (

Your Cart: {cartItems.length}

{cartItems.map((item) => (
{item.singleProduct.name}

${item.singleProduct.price}

decreaseCart(item)} > - addQty(item)} > +
))}

Order Summary

Subtotal: 1 (Units)

Est. total: $245.67

); }
